name: awesomely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that causes feelings of great admiration, respect, or fear: In the profound silence I surveyed the awesomely beautiful Himalayan landscape.
informal extremely well or extremely: I have no idea how this trick works, but it does! Awesomely! I don't believe I can possible explain how awesomely awful he truly is.
More examplesFewer examplesNo doubt the Badlands were awesomely grand the day that Michael Eastman snapped his photograph.The Government must begin the awesomely difficult task of rebuilding the public's trust.The setup also works awesomely as a wireless music solution.I have seen a lot of his movies, and in this one he is just awesomely bad.
